Jokowi Kesal Ratusan Ribu Pacul dan Cangkul Masih Harus Diimpor
06 Nov 2019, 04:27 by Ahmad Faiz Ibnu Sani, Rr. Ariyani Yakti Widyastuti
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Presiden Joko Widodo atau Jokowi meminta pengadaan barang dan jasa pemerintah menyasar industri dalam negeri. Ia menyayangkan banyak barang yang diimpor dari luar negeri padahal industri dalam negeri bisa memproduksinya.
Jokowi mencontohkan besarnya angka volume impor untuk pengadaan pacul dan cangkul. "Ini puluhan ribu, ratusan ribu cangkul yang dibutuhkan masih impor," katanya dalam acara Rakornas Pengadaan Barang/Jasa Pemerintah 2019 di JCC, Senayan, Jakarta, Rabu, 6 November 2019. "Apakah negara kita yang sebesar ini industrinya, yang sudah berkembang benar, pacul dan cangkul harus impor?"
Ia lalu meminta Kepala Lembaga Kebijakan Pengadaan Barang Jasa Pemerintah (LKPP) dan Kepala Badan Perencanaan dan Pembangunan Nasional (Bappenas) membuat desain strategi belanja pengadaan barang dan jasa yang mengembangkan industri dalam negeri. "Tolong didesain, ini baru satu barang (cangkul), barang lain masih ribuan. Enak banget itu negara yang di mana barang itu kita impor," ucap dia.
Menurut Jokowi, barang impor memang harganya lebih murah. Namun hal ini mematikan industri dalam negeri dan berdampak pada tidak adanya penciptaan lapangan kerja baru.
Jokowi menginstruksikan agar pengadaan barang dan jasa pemerintah mengutamakan produksi dalam negeri meski harganya lebih mahal. Ia pun meminta agar pengadaan barang impor dipersulit. Ia beralasan hal ini untuk mengatasi defisit neraca perdagangan Indonesia.
"Persulit barang impar impor itu. Impar impor senangnya kita. Stop, lah. Ini duit APBN, APBD. Saya lebih senang kalau kita beli barang lokal meski harganya sedikit lebih mahal," kata mantan Gubernur DKI Jakarta itu.
Sebelumnya Jokowi juga terlihat menahan marah saat membicarakan proses lelang di sektor konstruksi yang belum selesai, menjelang akhir tahun ini. Berdasarkan laporan Lembaga Kebijakan Pengadaan Barang Jasa Pemerintah (LKPP), pelaksanaan tender di sektor konstruksi pada 2019 yang masih berlangsung hingga kini mencapai Rp 31,7 triliun.
Pengadaan barang dan jasa pemerintah pada 2019 tercatat mencapai Rp 304,1 triliun. Dari angka tersebut, yang masih berproses Rp 39,0 triliun dan yang sudah selesai sebanyak Rp 265,1 triliun.
Jokowi menjelaskan, sistem yang berjalan secara elektronik seharusnya memudahkan proses pengadaan barang/jasa ini. "Ini tinggal November, Desember, masih e-tendering. Meski tahu ada yang cepat, tapi apakah yang seperti ini mau kita teruskan?," katanya.
Mantan Gubernur DKI Jakarta ini juga khawatir tender yang masih berjalan menjelang akhir tahun akan membuat pengerjaan konstruksi nantinya menjadi terburu-buru. Padahal, seharusnya proses lelang konstruksi sudah bisa selesai di awal-awal tahun. Jika November masih lelang maka pengerjaan proyek pasti berlangsung saat musim hujan.
"Tinggal dua bulan masih urusan konstruksi, masih lelang konstruksi. Kita ulang terus kesalahan seperti ini. Akhirnya apa, ya, kualitasnya jelek. Jembatan ambruk. SD ambruk. Karena kerja cepat-cepatan dan pas kerja, pas basah, hujan," ucap Jokowi sambil gesture tangannya menunjuk-nunjuk ke arah audiens.

Jokowi Upset Hundreds of Thousands of Hoes and Hoes Must Be Imported
06 Nov 2019, 04:27 by Ahmad Faiz Ibnu Sani, Rr. Ariyani Yakti Widyastuti
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - President Joko Widodo or Jokowi is requesting government procurement of goods and services targeting the domestic industry. He regretted that many goods were imported from abroad even though the domestic industry could produce them.
Jokowi gave an example of the large volume of imports for the procurement of hoes and hoes. "These are tens of thousands, hundreds of thousands of hoes needed are still imported," he said in the 2019 National Procurement Meeting for Government Goods / Services at the JCC, Senayan, Jakarta, Wednesday, November 6, 2019. "Is our country this big in the industry, which is already developing right , hoe and hoe must import? "
He then asked the Head of the Government Services Procurement Policy Agency (LKPP) and the Head of the National Planning and Development Agency (Bappenas) to design a strategy for the procurement of goods and services that develops the domestic industry. "Please design, this is just one item (hoe), other items are still in the thousands. It's really good that the country where we imported the goods," he said.
According to Jokowi, imported goods are indeed cheaper. But this has killed the domestic industry and resulted in the absence of new job creation.
Jokowi instructed that government procurement of goods and services prioritizes domestic production even though the price is more expensive. He also requested that the procurement of imported goods be complicated. He reasoned this to overcome Indonesia's trade balance deficit.
"Difficult to import imported goods. Imports of Impar are our pleasure. Stop, lah. This is state budget and regional budget funds. I am more happy if we buy local goods even though the price is a little more expensive," said the former Governor of DKI Jakarta.
Previously Jokowi was also seen holding back anger when discussing the unfinished auction process in the construction sector, towards the end of this year. Based on the report of the Government Service Goods Procurement Policy Agency (LKPP), the implementation of tenders in the construction sector in 2019 which is still ongoing until now reaches Rp 31.7 trillion.
Government goods and services procurement in 2019 will reach Rp 304.1 trillion. From this figure, those who are still processing Rp. 39.0 trillion and those who have completed Rp. 265.1 trillion.
Jokowi explained, the system that runs electronically should facilitate the process of procuring goods / services. "This is only November, December, still e-tendering. Although we know there is something fast, but what do we want to continue like this," he said.
The former Governor of DKI Jakarta is also worried that the tender that is still running towards the end of the year will make construction work in a hurry. In fact, the construction auction process should have been completed at the beginning of the year. If November is still an auction, project construction must take place during the rainy season.
"Only two months are still in construction, still in construction auction. We keep repeating mistakes like this. Finally what, yes, the quality is bad. The bridge collapsed. SD collapsed. Because of fast work and work pass, when it got wet, it rained," Jokowi said while gestures pointing toward the audience.
